concept.title: Index Mode
concept.shortdesc: The index mode determines how the Solr destination indexes records when writing to Solr. Index mode also determines how the destination handles errors.

conbody.p:
Solr destinationindex modeindex modeSolrYou can use the following index modes:
Record The destination indexes one record at a time, and then passes the record to Solr. If an error occurs, the destination passes the record to the stage for error handling.
Batch The destination indexes a batch of records at one time, and then passes the batch to Solr. If an error occurs, the destination rolls back any records that were indexed and passes the entire batch to the stage for error handling.
